thread.title: Rally pushes Apple Alphabet Microsoft to combined $1.6 trln market cap
thread.title_full: Rally pushes Apple Alphabet Microsoft to combined $1.6 trln market cap

title: Rally pushes Apple Alphabet Microsoft to combined $1.6 trln market cap
text:
Rally pushes Apple, Alphabet, Microsoft to combined $1.6 trln market cap 
Market Watch Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Friday marked a big day for a trio of tech stocks. Apple Inc., Microsoft Corp. and Google parent Alphabet Inc., now have a combined market capitalization of about $1.6 trillion. The gains for the companies on Friday marked the first time since Nov. 20 that three S&P 500 listed companies boasted a market cap of more than $400 billion, according to Dow Jones data. Apple 
...
